strapiPost.title: Arkansas Razorbacks Non-Conference Schedule
strapiPost.content:
Arkansas Mens Basketball team announces their non-conference schedule for the 20-21 season.

  • Info - Their opener begins November 25 at home hosting Mississippi Valley State. Other notable games include University of Central Arkansas on December 12 and Oklahoma State on January 30, 2021.
  • A full schedule can be found HERE
  • 2020-2021 season looks fun
